channel.title: UT mapping
channel.description: Anything related to the old UT engine.

item.title: JailBreak Mapping Tutorial PLZ
item.author: invalid@example.com (Utghost)
item.dc:creator: Utghost
item.content:encoded: can somebody post a website were i can get jailbreak mapping tutorials?

item.title: Unreal Ed 2.0
item.author: invalid@example.com (radagust)
item.dc:creator: radagust
item.content:encoded: How do I set up Unreal Ed 2.0 to edit Unreal Single Player maps?

item.title: player starts ?
item.author: invalid@example.com (Shadow_Elite)
item.dc:creator: Shadow_Elite
item.content:encoded: I have PlayerStarts positions on my map, but every I test it, I die and the comment box says "Shadow Elite left a small crater". Why is that?

item.title: Relection HOM
item.author: invalid@example.com (Uncle_Bob)
item.dc:creator: Uncle_Bob
item.content:encoded: I have been making a map for thunderstrikes mapping comp on UP. I did the marble, reflection effect on my floor and in the ceiling is a space to see the skybox. When you put on fly mode and fly up to about half the height of the level the reflection of the skybox goes white like a HOM. Please could someone tell me what is causing this and how to fix it?

item.title: UT Map Builder wanted for map polishing
item.author: invalid@example.com (R3plicant)
item.dc:creator: R3plicant
item.content:encoded:
Hi all, I have a map I've built with what little knowledge I have, and would be VERY honoured if there's a good map-builder out there who'd like to take 50% of the credit for building the map, for optimising it, adjusting the playabilty, lighting, sorting out possible BSP problems and bot pathing as I do not feel up to doing these tasks.
I'd like someone who's not overly busy and would like to take this on.
You'll get 50% of the credit for the map if you can help me.
*DM-Perdition = 1.8mb...

UT Map Builder wanted for map polishing
